review: Worked great!  I can't live without it.  I use it in hotels when I'm on the road when they have wifi.
author: Bryan Setzer

review: We cancelled cable and bought this. With Netflix we are set. It syncs great with all of our other Apple products. It does have some limitations (no pandora and most of the stations require subscriptions) but it's done everything we expected and more. One of my favorite features is that you can pair any remote to it
author: C. Pilster "The Visual Storyteller"

review: I updated from the 2nd generation Apple TV to this 3rd generation so that I could take advantage of the 1080P HD 60Hz playback on my TV. From what I understand the 2nd generation Apple TV's can recieve 1080P HD but decode it down to 720 P HD. I have noticed a difference in both picture quality, operating speed of the device, and wireless reception. If your big on picture quality I would recommend upgrading.
